SEARCH
Package address.data

Class AddressBook

java.lang.Object
address.data.AddressBook
public class AddressBook extends Object
The AddressBook class is a singleton that manages a list of address entries. It provides methods to add, delete, find, and display address entries, as well as read from a text file.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static AddressBook getInstance()
      Returns the singleton instance of AddressBook.
      Returns:
      the singleton instance.

    • getEntries

      public ArrayList<AddressEntry> getEntries()
      Returns the list of contacts.
      Returns:
      entries

    • automaticLoadContacts

      public void automaticLoadContacts()
      Automatically loads contacts from the "ContactsSaved.txt" file. If the address book is empty and the file exists, it reads the contacts from the file and adds them to the address book.

    • showContactsList

      public void showContactsList()
      Displays the list of contacts, sorted by last name. Prints a message if the list is empty.

    • findAddressEntry

      public ArrayList<AddressEntry> findAddressEntry(String lastName, boolean strict) throws Exception
      Finds address entries by last name.
      Parameters:
      lastName - the last name to search for.
      strict - whether the search should be strict.
      Returns:
      a list of matching address entries.
      Throws:
      Exception - if the last name does not exist in the contacts list in strict mode.

    • lastNameExistInContactsList

      public void lastNameExistInContactsList(String lastName) throws Exception
      Checks if a last name exists in the contacts list.
      Parameters:
      lastName - the last name to check for.
      Throws:
      Exception - if the last name does not exist in the contacts list.

    • addAddressEntry

      public void addAddressEntry(AddressEntry addressEntry)
      Adds a new address entry to the address book.
      Parameters:
      addressEntry - the address entry to add.

    • deleteEntry

      public void deleteEntry(String lastName)
      Deletes address entries by last name.
      Parameters:
      lastName - the last name of the entries to delete.

    • deleteEntry

      public void deleteEntry(String lastName, int index, ArrayList<AddressEntry> contacts)
      Deletes a specific address entry by last name and index from the list of found contacts.
      Parameters:
      lastName - the last name of the entries to delete.
      index - the index of the specific entry to delete.
      contacts - the list of found contacts.

    • readFromATextFile

      public void readFromATextFile(String filename)
      Reads address entries from a text file and adds them to the address book.
      Parameters:
      filename - the name of the file to read from.

    • showContactsFound

      public void showContactsFound(ArrayList<AddressEntry> contacts)
      Displays the list of found contacts.
      Parameters:
      contacts - the list of found contacts.

    • saveContacts

      public void saveContacts()
      Saves the contacts to a file. Each contact is written in a format with each attribute on a new line and each contact separated by a blank line.
